to Create Recipe// Restore the Guid string uid = Guid.NewGuid().ToString(); // Make a dynamic object out of the original message Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject inputMessage = context.Data.ToJObject(); var recipeRequest = inputMessage.ToObject <dynamic> (); string message = System.Net.WebUtility.HtmlEncode(recipeRequest.OriginalMessage.ToString()); // Retrieve the response template message string recipeResponseTemplate = context.Configuration.JsonDocs ["Create-Update Recipe"].JsonFormatString; // Create the response message string recipeResponse = string.Format(recipeResponseTemplate, uid, recipeRequest.RecipeID, message, "Awaiting", DateTime.UtcNow.ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ")); //Send the trace message to document the response message. if(context.Instance.IsDebugEnabled){ context.Instance.TraceDebug (" Create Recipe - Message ID: " + context.Data.Header.MessageId.ToString() + " Response Message: " + recipeResponse); } // Set message context to the response message context.Data.Text = recipeResponse; // Setup Communication Retry Properties context.Data.SetProperty ("Neo", "CommSuccess", "false"); context.Data.SetProperty ("Neo", "RetryCount", "0");
